data.content:
Nunu & Willump (Sasquatch Nunu & Willump)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: December 13, 2010

League of Legends is a game that offers a wide variety of champions and skins for players to choose from. One of the most beloved champions in the game is Nunu & Willump, a dynamic duo that brings joy and mischief to the Rift. Among the many skins available for this lovable pair,

stands out as a unique and exciting option.

Released on December 13, 2010, Sasquatch Nunu & Willump quickly became a fan favorite. This skin transforms Nunu into a young explorer, dressed in warm winter clothing, ready to brave the cold and embark on thrilling adventures with his yeti companion, Willump. Willump, on the other hand, takes on the appearance of a towering Sasquatch, covered in shaggy white fur and exuding an air of mystery.

The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable. Nunu's outfit is adorned with fur trims and intricate patterns, reflecting his adventurous spirit and love for exploration. His backpack is filled with various tools and supplies, emphasizing his role as an intrepid explorer. Willump's transformation into a Sasquatch is equally impressive, with his massive size and imposing presence. The designers have truly captured the essence of these characters and brought them to life in a new and exciting way.

But what makes Sasquatch Nunu & Willump truly special is the story behind the skin. Nunu & Willump's lore revolves around their heartwarming friendship and their shared love for adventure. Nunu, a young boy from the Freljord, stumbled upon Willump, a yeti, during one of his expeditions. The two quickly formed a bond and set out on countless escapades together.

In the game, Nunu & Willump are known for their unique playstyle. Nunu takes on the role of a support jungler, utilizing his abilities to control objectives and provide utility for his team. His Q ability, Consume, allows him to heal and deal damage to neutral monsters, making him a formidable force in the jungle. Willump, on the other hand, is a tanky yeti who excels at crowd control and disruption. His W ability, Biggest Snowball Ever!, allows him to roll a massive snowball, knocking up enemies in its path.

Despite their strengths, Nunu & Willump also have their weaknesses. Their early game can be challenging, as they heavily rely on teamwork and coordination to succeed. Additionally, their lack of mobility can make them vulnerable to champions with high burst damage. However, with proper positioning and strategic decision-making, Nunu & Willump can become a force to be reckoned with.

Throughout their journey, Nunu & Willump have received various skins, each offering a unique twist to their appearance. From the playful
to the fearsome

players have a plethora of options to choose from. However, Sasquatch Nunu & Willump holds a special place in the hearts of many players, as it captures the essence of their friendship and the spirit of adventure that defines them.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all the appearances of Nunu & Willump, including the delightful Sasquatch Nunu & Willump skin. Whether you're a fan of their heartwarming story or simply enjoy their unique playstyle, Nunu & Willump are sure to bring joy and excitement to your League of Legends experience.

Nunu & Willump (Default)

Release Date: Unknown

Nunu & Willump's

skin is the original appearance of this lovable duo in the League of Legends game. This skin does not require any RP to unlock as it is the default skin that players start with when they choose to play as Nunu & Willump. While there are various other skins available for this champion, the default skin holds a special place in the hearts of players as it represents the essence of Nunu & Willump's story and their journey in the game.

The Story of Nunu & Willump's Default Skin

The default skin of Nunu & Willump showcases the young boy Nunu and his yeti companion Willump in their original attire. Nunu is dressed in a warm winter outfit, complete with a cozy hat, scarf, and mittens, while Willump is covered in shaggy white fur to protect him from the cold. This skin perfectly captures the theme of their story, which revolves around their adventures in the icy Freljord region.

Nunu is a brave and curious child who hails from the Frostguard tribe in the Freljord. He discovered an ancient and powerful yeti named Willump trapped in a massive glacier. With his pure heart and innocent spirit, Nunu managed to befriend Willump and set him free. Together, they embarked on a journey to explore the world and bring joy to those they encountered.

The default skin reflects the bond between Nunu and Willump, showcasing their inseparable companionship and the trust they have in each other. Nunu's outfit is designed to withstand the harsh winter climate of the Freljord, while Willump's appearance highlights his strength and resilience as a yeti.

Nunu & Willump's Story and Gameplay

Nunu & Willump's story is one of friendship, adventure, and the power of imagination. In the game, Nunu & Willump are a unique duo champion, with Nunu controlling their movement and abilities while Willump provides brute strength and powerful attacks. They excel in the jungle role, where they can navigate the map, secure objectives, and support their team with crowd control and area-of-effect damage.

Nunu & Willump's gameplay revolves around their ability to consume minions and monsters with their Q ability, Consume, which not only grants them health but also empowers their ultimate ability, Absolute Zero. This ultimate ability allows Nunu & Willump to channel a devastating snowstorm, dealing massive damage to enemies caught within its radius.

While Nunu & Willump are formidable in team fights and objective control, they do have their weaknesses. Their early game can be challenging, as they heavily rely on their Q ability to sustain themselves in the jungle. Additionally, they lack mobility, making them vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or crowd control.

Despite their weaknesses, Nunu & Willump's unique playstyle and heartwarming story have made them a beloved champion in the League of Legends community. Their default skin represents the beginning of their journey and serves as a reminder of the bond they share.

Explore Nunu & Willump's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Nunu & Willump in the League of Legends game. From their default skin to various other exciting and thematic skins, you can witness the evolution of their visual design and immerse yourself in their captivating world.

Whether you choose to play as Nunu & Willump in their default skin or explore their alternate appearances, their story and gameplay are sure to leave a lasting impression. Join Nunu and his faithful yeti companion Willump on their adventures and experience the magic of their friendship in the League of Legends.

Nunu & Willump (Grungy Nunu & Willump)

Release Date: Unknown

RP Cost: Unknown

The Grungy Nunu & Willump skin is a unique and exciting addition to the League of Legends universe. This skin transforms the lovable duo into a pair of mischievous troublemakers, ready to wreak havoc on the Rift. With its gritty and urban aesthetic, Grungy Nunu & Willump offers players a fresh and edgy take on these beloved characters.

Grungy Nunu & Willump features a complete visual overhaul for both Nunu and Willump, giving them a grungy and rebellious appearance. Nunu, the young boy, is dressed in tattered clothing, with a worn-out cap and a mischievous grin on his face. Willump, the yeti, is covered in graffiti, showcasing their rebellious nature. The skin also introduces new particle effects, animations, and sound effects that perfectly complement the theme.

One of the standout features of the Grungy Nunu & Willump skin is the unique recall animation. When recalling, Nunu and Willump tag a nearby wall with spray paint, leaving their mark on the battlefield. This small detail adds an extra layer of personality to the skin, making it even more enjoyable to play with.

Now, let's delve into the story of Nunu & Willump and their place in the League of Legends universe. Nunu & Willump are a dynamic duo, with Nunu being a young boy from the Freljord and Willump being a powerful yeti. Together, they embark on thrilling adventures, exploring the world and spreading joy wherever they go.

Nunu & Willump's story begins with Nunu's desire to prove himself to his village. In search of a legendary monster, Nunu stumbles upon Willump, a lonely yeti trapped in a cave. The two quickly form a bond and set off on a journey to discover the truth behind the mythical creature. Along the way, they encounter various challenges and enemies, but their unwavering friendship and determination help them overcome every obstacle.

In the game, Nunu & Willump are known for their unique playstyle and abilities. Nunu acts as the controller, utilizing his ice-based abilities to slow down enemies and disrupt their movements. Willump, on the other hand, is the powerhouse, dealing massive damage with his brute strength. Together, they make a formidable team, capable of turning the tide of battle in their favor.

One of Nunu & Willump's strengths lies in their ability to control objectives. Their Q ability, Consume, allows them to secure neutral objectives such as Dragon and Baron Nashor, giving their team a significant advantage. Additionally, their W ability, Blood Boil, provides a powerful attack speed and movement speed buff to their allies, making them invaluable in team fights.

However, Nunu & Willump also have their weaknesses. They are relatively squishy and vulnerable to burst damage, making them easy targets for assassins and burst mages. Additionally, their ultimate ability, Absolute Zero, requires careful positioning and timing to maximize its effectiveness, as it can be interrupted easily by crowd control abilities.

Despite their weaknesses, Nunu & Willump have carved out a special place in the League of Legends community. Their heartwarming story and unique gameplay mechanics have made them fan favorites. Whether you're a fan of their adventurous spirit or their ability to control objectives, Nunu & Willump are a joy to play and watch.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Nunu & Willump's various appearances in the League of Legends universe. From their classic skins to their most recent additions, such as Grungy Nunu & Willump, you can explore the different looks and themes that have been created for this lovable duo.

Nunu & Willump (Demolisher Nunu & Willump)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 30, 2020

Demolisher Nunu & Willump is a skin that brings a whole new look to the lovable duo in the popular game League of Legends. Released on April 30, 2020, this skin is available for 1350 RP, allowing players to transform Nunu & Willump into a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

The Demolisher Nunu & Willump skin takes the concept of destruction and combines it with the playful nature of the duo. Nunu, the young boy, is dressed in a construction worker outfit, complete with a hard hat and a tool belt. Willump, the yeti, is transformed into a massive wrecking ball, ready to demolish anything in its path.

The skin features a variety of new visual effects and animations that perfectly capture the theme of destruction. Nunu's abilities are enhanced with explosive effects, while Willump's attacks leave a trail of destruction behind. The recall animation showcases Nunu & Willump operating a wrecking ball, smashing through the ground and leaving a trail of rubble.

But the Demolisher Nunu & Willump skin is not just about looks. It also brings new sound effects that add to the immersive experience. From the sound of crashing buildings to the rumble of the wrecking ball, every aspect of the skin is designed to make players feel like they are truly wreaking havoc on the battlefield.

Now, let's take a closer look at the story of Nunu & Willump and their place in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Nunu & Willump

Nunu & Willump are a unique duo in the world of League of Legends. Nunu, a young boy from the Freljord, stumbled upon a yeti named Willump while exploring the frozen tundra. The two quickly formed a bond and set out on a journey together.

Nunu, armed with his trusty slingshot, and Willump, with his immense strength, embarked on a quest to find Nunu's mother, who had gone missing. Along the way, they encountered various challenges and faced dangerous creatures, but their friendship and determination carried them through.

In the game, Nunu & Willump are known for their unique playstyle. Nunu acts as the controller, using his abilities to slow down enemies and disrupt their movements. Willump, on the other hand, is the powerhouse, dealing massive damage with his attacks and abilities.

One of the key strengths of Nunu & Willump is their ability to control objectives on the map. Their ultimate ability, Absolute Zero, can be used to deal massive damage to enemies and secure objectives such as Dragon or Baron Nashor. This makes them a valuable asset to any team looking to secure map control and gain an advantage in the game.

However, Nunu & Willump also have their weaknesses. They are relatively squishy compared to other tank champions, making them vulnerable to burst damage. Additionally, their abilities require good positioning and coordination with teammates to be effective, making them more challenging to master compared to some other champions.

Despite their weaknesses, Nunu & Willump have become fan favorites due to their charming personalities and unique gameplay. The addition of the Demolisher Nunu & Willump skin adds another layer of excitement for players, allowing them to experience the duo in a whole new way.

If you want to learn more about Nunu & Willump and explore their various appearances in the game, this page is the perfect resource for you. Here, you can find information, videos, and more about all the different skins and costumes available for Nunu & Willump, including the Demolisher Nunu & Willump skin.

So, whether you're a fan of Nunu & Willump or just looking for a new skin to add to your collection, the Demolisher Nunu & Willump skin is definitely worth checking out. Get ready to unleash destruction on the battlefield with this exciting new addition to the League of Legends universe!

Nunu & Willump (Space Groove Nunu & Willump)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 18, 2021

The Space Groove Nunu & Willump skin is a vibrant and cosmic addition to the League of Legends universe. Released on March 18, 2021, this skin brings a whole new level of intergalactic fun to the game. With its unique design and captivating visuals, Space Groove Nunu & Willump is a must-have for fans of the champion.

The costume features Nunu and Willump dressed in futuristic space-themed outfits. Nunu, the young boy, is seen wearing a purple space suit with glowing neon accents. His helmet is adorned with a pair of funky, oversized goggles that give him a playful and mischievous look. Willump, the yeti, is also decked out in a matching purple space suit, complete with glowing details and a helmet that covers his entire face. The duo looks ready to explore the cosmos and embark on exciting adventures.

One of the standout features of the Space Groove Nunu & Willump skin is the vibrant color palette. The purple hues, combined with neon accents, create a visually stunning effect that is sure to catch the eye of both allies and enemies on the battlefield. The skin also incorporates cosmic elements, such as stars and galaxies, which add to the overall space theme.

In addition to the visual changes, the Space Groove Nunu & Willump skin also includes new sound effects and animations. Abilities and spells are accompanied by futuristic sound effects that further enhance the cosmic atmosphere. The recall animation is particularly noteworthy, as Nunu and Willump hop into a rocket and blast off into space, leaving a trail of stardust behind them.

Now, let's delve into the story of Nunu & Willump and their place in the League of Legends universe. Nunu is a young boy from the Freljord, a harsh and icy region in Runeterra. He is accompanied by Willump, a massive yeti who serves as his protector and friend. Together, they form an inseparable duo, embarking on thrilling adventures and facing formidable challenges.

Nunu & Willump's story is centered around their quest to save Nunu's mother, who has fallen ill. In their journey, they encounter various champions and factions, forming alliances and learning valuable lessons along the way. Their bond is unbreakable, and their determination to overcome obstacles is unwavering.

In terms of gameplay, Nunu & Willump are known for their unique playstyle and utility. They excel in the jungle role, utilizing Willump's brute strength and Nunu's magical abilities to control the battlefield. Their signature ability,

allows them to channel a powerful blizzard that damages and slows enemies in a large area. This ability can be devastating when used in combination with their other crowd control spells.

However, Nunu & Willump also have their weaknesses. They are relatively weak in the early game and can struggle against aggressive opponents. Their reliance on crowd control and utility means that they may lack the raw damage output of other champions. Additionally, their playstyle requires good coordination and communication with teammates to maximize their effectiveness.

Despite their weaknesses, Nunu & Willump have carved out a unique place in the League of Legends community. Their heartwarming story and lovable personalities have made them fan favorites. The addition of the Space Groove Nunu & Willump skin only adds to their charm, allowing players to experience their cosmic adventures in style.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Nunu & Willump, including the Space Groove Nunu & Willump skin. Explore their captivating story, discover their strengths and weaknesses, and witness their cosmic journey through the League of Legends universe.

Nunu & Willump: The Boy and His Yeti

Release Date: February 14, 2018

League of Legends is a game filled with diverse and fascinating champions, each with their own unique abilities and stories. One such champion is Nunu & Willump, a dynamic duo that brings a heartwarming tale of friendship and adventure to the Summoner's Rift. This article will delve into the depths of their story, explore their strengths and weaknesses, and discuss their place in the game.

The Story of Nunu & Willump

Nunu & Willump's story begins in the icy Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land where survival is a constant struggle. Nunu, a young boy with an insatiable curiosity, found himself drawn to the legends of a mythical creature known as the Yeti. Determined to prove their existence, Nunu embarked on a perilous journey into the frozen wilderness.

During his quest, Nunu stumbled upon a cave where he discovered Willump, a massive Yeti trapped in a massive block of ice. With his unwavering belief and a touch of magic, Nunu managed to free Willump from his icy prison. Grateful for his freedom, Willump pledged his loyalty to Nunu, and the two became inseparable friends.

Together, Nunu & Willump set out to explore the world, spreading joy and mischief wherever they went. Their adventures took them far and wide, from the bustling streets of Piltover to the treacherous jungles of Ixtal. Along the way, they encountered various champions and creatures, forging bonds and leaving a lasting impact on those they met.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Nunu & Willump possess a unique playstyle that revolves around their synergy and teamwork. As a duo, they excel in disrupting the enemy team and providing utility to their allies. Their primary strength lies in their ability to control the battlefield and dictate the flow of team fights.

One of their key strengths is their crowd control capabilities. Nunu can unleash a powerful snowball, damaging and slowing enemies in its path. This ability, combined with Willump's Glacial Prison ultimate, which freezes enemies in a large area, allows them to initiate fights and lock down priority targets. Their crowd control can be a game-changer, providing opportunities for their team to secure kills and objectives.

Additionally, Nunu & Willump have excellent objective control. Their Consume ability allows them to secure neutral objectives such as Dragon and Baron Nashor with ease, thanks to the massive true damage it deals to monsters. This makes them a valuable asset in securing crucial objectives and gaining an advantage for their team.

However, like any champion, Nunu & Willump also have their weaknesses. They heavily rely on their crowd control and utility, which means they lack significant burst damage. While they can disrupt and control fights, they may struggle to secure kills on their own. Additionally, their reliance on teamwork and coordination means they may struggle in disorganized or chaotic team environments.

Nunu & Willump in the Game

Nunu & Willump are primarily played in the jungle role, where they can utilize their abilities to control the map and support their team. Their ability to clear jungle camps quickly and secure objectives makes them a popular pick among junglers who prioritize map control and objective dominance.

In the early game, Nunu & Willump can invade the enemy jungle, stealing camps and disrupting the enemy jungler's path. Their crowd control and mobility allow them to escape sticky situations or catch opponents off guard. Additionally, their ability to provide vision with their Snowball Barrage ability makes them excellent at tracking the enemy jungler's movements and setting up counter-ganks.

As the game progresses, Nunu & Willump transition into a supportive role, using their crowd control and utility to protect their carries and initiate team fights. Their Glacial Prison ultimate can turn the tide of a battle, freezing multiple enemies and allowing their team to follow up with devastating damage. Their ability to control objectives also makes them valuable in securing crucial buffs and neutral objectives for their team.

Furthermore, Nunu & Willump's versatility allows them to adapt to different team compositions and playstyles. Whether it's engaging fights, peeling for their carries, or providing vision and objective control, they can fulfill various roles depending on the needs of their team.

Explore Nunu & Willump's Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all the skins available for Nunu & Willump. From the classic Nunu & Willump to the whimsical Papercraft Nunu & Willump, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer a more traditional look or want to embrace the fantastical, our website has you covered.

So, if you're curious to see Nunu & Willump's skins in action, head over to our page and immerse yourself in the magical world of this lovable duo.

Nunu & Willump's story is a testament to the power of friendship and the wonders that can be achieved when unlikely allies come together. Their journey from the frozen tundras of the Freljord to the battlefields of Summoner's Rift has captivated players and fans alike. With their unique playstyle and heartwarming tale, Nunu & Willump continue to leave a lasting impression on the world of League of Legends.

Nunu & Willump (Zombie Nunu & Willump)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 31, 2019

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is
This skin, released on October 31, 2019, adds a spooky twist to the lovable duo, Nunu & Willump. In this article, we will delve into the story behind the

costume and explore all the intricate details of this skin.

The

skin transforms the young boy and his yeti companion into undead creatures, ready to haunt the Summoner's Rift. Nunu, who is usually seen wearing a warm winter outfit, now dons tattered clothes, covered in dirt and bloodstains. His face is pale, with sunken eyes and a menacing grin. Willump, the lovable yeti, has also undergone a transformation. His fur is now matted and disheveled, and his eyes glow with an eerie green light.

The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable. From the decaying flesh on Nunu's face to the exposed bones on Willump's body, every aspect of their zombified appearance has been meticulously designed. The skin also features unique animations and visual effects that further enhance the spooky theme. For example, Nunu's abilities now leave behind a trail of green mist, and his ultimate ability, Absolute Zero, creates a chilling aura that sends shivers down the spines of his enemies.

Now, let's take a step back and explore the story of Nunu & Willump. Nunu, a young boy from the Freljord, embarked on a journey to find the mythical creature known as the Yeti. After a series of adventures, Nunu discovered Willump, a gentle yeti who had been trapped in a cave. The two formed an unbreakable bond and set out on a quest to bring harmony to the world.

In the game, Nunu & Willump are classified as a tank and support duo. They excel at crowd control and disruption, making them a valuable asset in team fights. Nunu's abilities revolve around ice and snow, allowing him to slow down enemies and create zones of control. Willump, on the other hand, is a powerful melee fighter who can deal significant damage while also providing utility to his team.

Despite their strengths, Nunu & Willump also have their weaknesses. They lack sustained damage output, making them reliant on their team to secure kills. Additionally, their abilities require careful positioning and coordination to maximize their effectiveness. However, skilled players can utilize their crowd control and utility to turn the tide of battles and protect their allies.

Nunu & Willump have become fan favorites due to their endearing story and unique gameplay mechanics. Their playful nature and heartwarming interactions have captured the hearts of many players. Whether it's Nunu riding on Willump's back or their cheerful banter during gameplay, the duo brings a sense of joy and lightheartedness to the game.

If you want to explore all the appearances of Nunu & Willump, including the

skin, you can find more information and videos on this page. From their classic outfits to their various themed skins, each appearance adds a new layer of depth to their character and allows players to express their individuality.

So, whether you're a fan of the undead or simply enjoy playing as Nunu & Willump, the

skin is a must-have for your collection. With its hauntingly beautiful design and unique animations, it brings a fresh and spooky twist to the beloved duo. Embrace the darkness and unleash the undead power of Nunu & Willump on the Summoner's Rift!

Nunu & Willump (Nunu & Beelump)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 21, 2019

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that has captured the hearts of players is the

skin for the lovable duo, Nunu & Willump. This skin, released on November 21, 2019, adds a whimsical twist to the already charming champions, giving them a fresh and exciting look.

The

skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. However, the amount of detail and effort put into this skin truly makes it worth the investment for any Nunu & Willump enthusiast.

Now, let's delve into the details of this delightful skin. The

skin transforms Nunu into a beekeeper, complete with a beekeeper's hat, protective suit, and a buzzing beehive backpack. Willump, on the other hand, takes on the appearance of a giant, friendly bee named Beelump. Together, they embark on their adventures, spreading joy and honey wherever they go.

The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable. Nunu's beekeeper hat is adorned with flowers and a bee-shaped pin, while his protective suit is covered in intricate honeycomb patterns. The beehive backpack not only adds to the overall aesthetic but also serves as a home for the adorable Beelump. Willump's transformation into Beelump is equally impressive, with his fur taking on a vibrant yellow color and his wings fluttering with every movement.

But the visual changes are not the only thing that makes the

skin special. The skin also features unique animations and sound effects that further enhance the experience. Nunu's abilities now have a bee-themed twist, with honey trails left behind as he dashes around the map. The sound effects are also modified to match the theme, with buzzing bees and cheerful melodies accompanying Nunu & Willump's every move.

Now that we've explored the intricacies of the

skin, let's take a moment to appreciate the champions themselves. Nunu & Willump are a dynamic duo that bring a mix of utility and crowd control to the game. Nunu, the young boy, rides on the back of Willump, a yeti, as they traverse the battlefield together.

Nunu & Willump's story is a heartwarming tale of friendship and adventure. Nunu, a mischievous child from the Freljord, stumbled upon the sleeping Willump and decided to wake him up. From that moment on, the two became inseparable, embarking on a journey to find Nunu's mother and discover the wonders of the world.

In the game, Nunu & Willump excel at disrupting the enemy team and providing crowd control. Their abilities allow them to slow down enemies, create zones of control, and even unleash a devastating snowball that can knock opponents off their feet. Their ultimate ability, Absolute Zero, channels the power of the cold to deal massive damage to anyone caught in its radius.

However, like any champion, Nunu & Willump also have their weaknesses. They are relatively squishy and can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, their abilities have long cooldowns, requiring careful timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness.

Despite their weaknesses, Nunu & Willump have found their place in the game as a versatile pick in both the jungle and support roles. Their ability to control objectives, provide vision, and disrupt team fights make them a valuable asset to any team composition.

If you're interested in learning more about Nunu & Willump and their various appearances, this page is the perfect resource for you. Here, you can find information, videos, and images showcasing all the different skins available for this lovable duo.

So, whether you're a fan of the
skin or simply intrigued by the adventures of Nunu & Willump, be sure to check out this page for all the latest updates and content related to these beloved champions.

Nunu & Willump (Papercraft Nunu & Willump)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 5, 2020

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions and their unique skins. One of the most beloved champions in the game is Nunu & Willump, a dynamic duo that brings joy and mischief to the Rift. With the release of the

skin on March 5, 2020, players were introduced to a whimsical and enchanting new look for this lovable pair.

The

skin is a visual masterpiece that transforms the duo into a world made entirely of paper. From their outfits to their abilities, every detail is meticulously crafted to resemble origami art. This skin truly captures the essence of Nunu & Willump's playful nature and adds a touch of magic to their gameplay.

Let's delve into the intricate details of this skin. Nunu, the young boy, is dressed in a vibrant red and white origami outfit. His hat is adorned with paper flowers, and his backpack is filled with paper snowballs. Willump, the yeti, is also transformed into a magnificent origami creature. His fur is replaced with delicate paper folds, and his eyes glow with a mischievous sparkle.

But the beauty of this skin lies not only in its appearance but also in the way it enhances Nunu & Willump's abilities. When Nunu uses his Q ability, Consume, he now munches on a paper fish instead of a snowball. The W ability, Biggest Snowball Ever!, transforms Nunu into a rolling paper snowball, leaving a trail of paper flakes in his wake. The E ability, Snowball Barrage, hurls paper snowballs at enemies, leaving behind a trail of colorful paper confetti. And finally, the ultimate ability, Absolute Zero, envelops Nunu & Willump in a swirling vortex of paper, freezing enemies in their tracks.

Now that we've explored the intricacies of the

skin, let's take a moment to appreciate the story behind this lovable duo. Nunu & Willump's tale begins in the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. Nunu, a young boy with an adventurous spirit, befriends Willump, a yeti who has been trapped in ice for centuries. Together, they embark on a journey to find Nunu's mother, who has gone missing.

Throughout their adventures, Nunu & Willump face numerous challenges and encounter various champions from the League of Legends universe. Their story is one of friendship, bravery, and the power of imagination. Nunu's unwavering belief in the magic of the world and Willump's protective nature create a bond that transcends the physical realm.

In the game, Nunu & Willump are classified as a tank and support duo. Their unique playstyle revolves around crowd control and disruption. Nunu's abilities allow him to sustain in fights while providing utility for his team. Willump, on the other hand, brings immense crowd control with his abilities, making him a formidable force in team fights.

However, like any champion, Nunu & Willump have their strengths and weaknesses. Their crowd control abilities make them excellent initiators, but they lack sustained damage output. Additionally, their reliance on teamwork and coordination can be a double-edged sword, as miscommunication can lead to missed opportunities.

Despite their weaknesses, Nunu & Willump have found their place in the League of Legends community. Their playful nature and heartwarming story have endeared them to players around the world. Whether it's embarking on epic quests or simply having fun in the Howling Abyss, Nunu & Willump bring a sense of joy and adventure to every game they're a part of.

The Story of Nunu & Willump

Nunu & Willump are inseparable companions who embark on thrilling adventures in the icy Freljord. Nunu, a young boy with an insatiable curiosity, discovered a yeti named Willump trapped in a massive block of ice. With his childlike innocence and boundless imagination, Nunu believed that Willump was a mythical beast in need of a friend. Together, they broke free from the ice and set off on a journey filled with wonder and excitement.

In the game, Nunu & Willump are classified as a tank and support duo. They excel at crowd control and disruption, making them valuable assets in team fights. Nunu's abilities revolve around ice and snow, while Willump's immense strength and size make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

One of their signature abilities is

where Nunu commands Willump to bite a target, dealing damage and healing themselves. This ability allows them to sustain in fights and secure objectives such as neutral monsters. Their ultimate ability,

channels the power of the Freljord, creating a massive blizzard that damages and slows enemies caught within its radius.

While Nunu & Willump have their strengths, they also have weaknesses. They lack mobility, making them vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or crowd control. Additionally, their abilities require coordination and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. However, skilled players can utilize their crowd control and disruption to turn the tide of battles and protect their teammates.

In the lore of League of Legends, Nunu & Willump have encountered various champions and played significant roles in events such as the Freljord's civil war. Their story showcases the power of friendship and the boundless imagination of a child. They remind us that even in the harshest of environments, love and companionship can conquer all.
